# toggle

**Type Property**

Indicates that a toggle has been pressed (touch down).

## Declaration

```swift
static let toggle: SensoryFeedback.PressFeedback
```

## Discussion

Toggle controls should also play [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SensoryFeedback/selection(_:)] with [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SensoryFeedback/SelectionFeedback/on] and [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SensoryFeedback/SelectionFeedback/off].

Only plays feedback on visionOS.
title: toggle
